mapper.select: SELECT `address_id`,`user_name`,`user_adress`,`order_id`,`order_number`,`order_status`,`create_time` ,u.`user_id`,`login_name`,`login_password`,`real_name`,`sex`,`status`,`telephone`,`regeist_time`,`order_amount` FROM `order` o INNER JOIN `user` u ON o.`user_id`=u.`user_id` INNER JOIN address a ON a.`user_id`=u.`user_id`
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` ( user_id, order_number, order_amount, address, order_status, create_time ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{order_number}, #{order_amount}, #{address}, #{order_status}, #{create_time} );
